reviewText: Horrible!!!! Cannot remove the Subtitles. Korean version seems to be default. So sorry I bought this.
the entire cast in this movie went on to famous careers
As good as I remembered from when I saw it as a child.

A great epic of staunch clan tradition. "Never give an inch when a mile can be had by just taking it!" That's a modern way of saying what the Vikings did for every day living. It's a learning, rousing story that keeps everyone on the edge of their seat....a classic look at the Norway too.
